description: Try our easy to follow Snow White Caramel Apples recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Confectionery,Low saturated fat,High fibre,Seafood free,Low salt,Apple,Egg free,Low fat,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert
name: Snow White Caramel Apples Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Wash apples in hot water to remove wax. Dry thoroughly. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Insert sticks through stem end of apples and stand on tray. Chill for 15 minutes.

Meanwhile, place caramel lollies, butterscotch and 1/4 cup water into a small saucepan. Stir constantly over medium heat until smooth. Tilt pan and dip 1 apple into caramel sauce to coat. Allow excess to drip off. Return to tray. Repeat with a further 3 apples.
Place chocolate crispies in a bowl. Dip each caramel apple into crispies to coat. Repeat in batches of 4 until all apples have been coated in caramel and crispies. Chill for 1 hour to set.
